Version 2.0.72 - Score-Based Resume Correction

Bug Fixes

  • Fix refresh loading current slide instead of furthest: use score.raw to determine actual furthest progress
  • lesson_location stores current position (wrong after backward nav), score.raw stores furthest progress

Changes

  • Wrap LMSInitialize/Initialize to correct resume position from score.raw before content reads CMI data
  • Initial progress retry now reads both lesson_location and score.raw, uses max as furthest slide
  • Score-based correction works for both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.71: Faster initial progress: 200ms retry instead of fixed 1000ms timeout
  • v2.0.70: Early total slides detection before initial progress send
  • v2.0.69: Preserve SCORM score-based progress in activity progress API
